Package me.agno.gridjavacore

Interface IGrid<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of data displayed in the grid
All Superinterfaces:
IGridOptions
All Known Implementing Classes:
Grid
public interface IGrid<T> extends IGridOptions
Interface representing a grid that displays data based on a given query and provides filtering, sorting, searching, and pagination functionality.

  • Method Details

    • getQuery

      LinkedHashMap<String,List<String>> getQuery()
      Returns the query parameters used for filtering, sorting, searching, and pagination.
      Returns:
      a LinkedHashMap containing the query parameters as key-value pairs, where the key is the parameter name and the value is a list of parameter values

    • setQuery

      void setQuery(LinkedHashMap<String,List<String>> query)
      Sets the query parameters used for filtering, sorting, searching, and pagination.
      Parameters:
      query - the query parameters as a LinkedHashMap, where the key is the parameter name and the value is a list of parameter values

    • getRemoveDiacritics

      String getRemoveDiacritics()
      Retrieves the database stored procedure name used to remove diacritics for filtering purposes. Diacritics are accents or special characters added to letters in some languages. This method returns the database stored procedure name that is used to remove diacritics from grid filters.
      Returns:
      the string used to remove diacritics

    • setRemoveDiacritics

      void setRemoveDiacritics(String removeDiacritics)
      Sets the database stored procedure name used to remove diacritics for filtering purposes. Diacritics are accents or special characters added to letters in some languages. This method sets the database stored procedure name that is used to remove diacritics from grid filters.
      Parameters:
      removeDiacritics - the string used to remove diacritics

      Returns:
      the count of items to be displayed

      boolean isDefaultSortEnabled()
      Checks if the default sorting is enabled for the grid.
      Returns:
      true if the default sorting is enabled, false otherwise

      Sets whether the default sorting is enabled for the grid.
      Parameters:
      defaultFilteringEnabled - true to enable default sorting, false to disable

      jakarta.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
      Retrieves the EntityManager object used for managing the persistence context. The EntityManager object is responsible for performing database operations, such as querying, persisting, and deleting entities.
      Returns:
      the EntityManager object

    • getCriteriaBuilder

      jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder getCriteriaBuilder()
      Retrieves the CriteriaBuilder object used for creating criteria queries and expressions. The CriteriaBuilder object is a factory that provides methods for constructing criteria queries, predicates, expressions, and other criteria-related objects.
      Returns:
      the CriteriaBuilder object

    • getCriteriaQuery

      jakarta.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery<T> getCriteriaQuery()
      Retrieves the CriteriaQuery object used for creating criteria queries. The CriteriaQuery object is used to define the query structure and restrictions.
      Returns:
      the CriteriaQuery object

    • getRoot

      jakarta.persistence.criteria.Root<T> getRoot()
      Retrieves the root object for the criteria query. The root object represents the entity type being queried.
      Returns:
      the root object

      Class<T> getTargetType()
      Retrieves the target type of the grid.
      Returns:
      the Class object representing the target type of the grid
